DESCRIPTION_CHUTE_PERMISSION: Allows certain employees to store items in the chute.
DESCRIPTION_REQUIRE_IN_ORBIT: Prevents players from putting items inside the chute when the ship is on a planet.
DESCRIPTION_TIME_TO_STORE: Time in seconds to hold to store an item.
DESCRIPTION_TIME_TO_RETRIEVE: Time in seconds between each item spawn.
DESCRIPTION_STOP_AFTER:
Limits the amount of items that can be spawned inside the chute.

This is to prevent further lag when retrieve too many items.
DESCRIPTION_BLACKLIST:
List of items that are not allowed in the chute.

The items' name should be separated by a comma (,).
You can edit the config directly in the file for a better experience.
DESCRIPTION_INVENTORY_PERMISSION: Allows certain employees to retrieve items from the inventory.
DESCRIPTION_AS_SAFE: Prevents the ship's inventory from clearing when all players die.
DESCRIPTION_PERSIST_THROUGH_FIRE: Prevents the ship's inventory from clearing when the crew gets fired.
DESCRIPTION_MAX_ITEM_COUNT:
Limits the amount of items that can be inside the ship's inventory.

If the ship's inventory already has too many items, it won't empty the excess.
DESCRIPTION_KEEP_RATE: Defines how likely each item is to be kept when wiping.
DESCRIPTION_INVENTORY_COMMAND: Determines the command to type to access the ship's inventory.
DESCRIPTION_YES_PLEASE: Automatically places the cursor on the 'YES' option when retrieving items.
DESCRIPTION_SHOW_CONFIRMATION: Shows the confirmation when retrieving items.
DESCRIPTION_SHOW_TRADEMARK: Determines if the mod shows the company's trademark in the terminal.
DESCRIPTION_INVENTORY_REFRESH_RATE: Time in seconds between each refresh call. The lower the refresh rate is, the more accurate the inventory is. However, it will be more WIFI-hungry. *You will need to close the lobby*
DESCRIPTION_INVENTORY_UPDATE_CHECK_SILEN:
Removes the log message when the inventory is up to date.

It's recommended to keep this setting as it is, since it can remove crucial information that would allow the authors to debug a problem.
DESCRIPTION_FORCE_UPDATE_UPON_ADDING: Forces the update of the cache when you are storing an item.
DESCRIPTION_FORCE_UPDATE_UPON_REMOVING: Forces the update of the cache when you are retrieving an item.
DESCRIPTION_CHUTE_IS_UNLOCK: Determines if the chute is an unlockable item or if it is always available. *You will need to close the lobby*
DESCRIPTION_UNLOCK_COST: Determines how expensive it is to unlock the chute.
DESCRIPTION_UNLOCK_NAME:
Determines the text to type in order to unlock the chute.

Note that some texts like 'inventory' can already been taken by other unlockables.

TEXT_ALL_RETRIEVE: You are about to retrieve everything (${0}).
